SummaryEnglish: Pokémon: The 'Bridged Series has been described as "absurd". This may be an understatement. Basically, we've taken the idea of "Abridging", copied it completely, and then did something slightly different. And applied it to Pokémon. It's a shorter, and hopefully funnier, version of Pokémon, produced by fans of the original in an attempt to make other fans laugh.

1.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash and Misty leave Brock behind, but pick up a more-than-worthy replacement: Tracey Sketchit. They also enslave a Lapras.

2.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Misty narrowly avoids engagement, with the help of Ash's refusal to know what he's doing.

3.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash frees SlaveLabor the Lapras and returns home. Brock also returns, from the netherworld. Misty is surprisingly welcoming of Brock's return.

4.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash Ketchum is joined by Misty, now properly voiced by Nowacking instead of a guy! Also, there are more explosions.

5.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash Ketchum is joined by Misty, now properly voiced by Nowacking instead of a guy! Also, there are more explosions

6.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Team Rocket terrorizes Ash and Misty by just kinda being there. Not much happens. YOU'LL BE AT THE EDGE OF YOUR SEATS!

7.SummaryEnglish: In this minisode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Team Rocket has an orgasmic adventure. Made by Elite3.

8.SummaryEnglish: In this minisode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash ponders the difficult questions of life, such as: How do I beat the next Gym Leader? Made by Elite3.

9.SummaryEnglish: Always be careful of your stick and balls around cookies. You never know, you could catch something... Made by Elite3.

10.SummaryEnglish: A long-awaited addition to the team finally arrives. Will the presence of a newborn tone down the vulgarity of our heroes? Probably not.

1.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash Ketchum starts off his journey with a brand new, yet severely jaded Pikachu, and has his first encounter: a girl named Misty.

2.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash rushes to Viridian City to get help for his dying/dead Pikachu. Unfortunately, all he gets is Nurse Joy, Misty, Team Rocket, and an odd call from Professor Oak.

3.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash catches TWO Pokemon, somehow. How will his new Mewtwo affect his journey? I guess you'll have to find out in the movie...

4.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Misty makes Ash and the Samurai's Metapods harden. Pikachu also sets fire to the homes of countless terrorist bugs.

5.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Seymour Butts gives Ash, Misty, and some guy named Brock a tour of Mt. Moon. Seriously, who the heck is Brock?

6.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Brock actually gets introduced. Ash Ketchum and Misty (No Last Name) go on a date. Flint has some advice to give.

7.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash Ketchum faces off against his ehst friend, Misty, in a battle of not-wits. Brock goes off somewhere. What the hell is a Sisters(ies)?(er?)s?.

8.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash Ketchum catches his Charmander, much to the awe of Brock and dismay of Misty. Charmander's owner, Damian, gets a critical lesson on morals from... Brock?

9.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Brock meets fellow Pokemon Breeder Suzy, but somehow has nothing in common with her. Ash makes fun of Misty as per usual.

10.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash, Misty, and Brock stumble upon someone even MORE annoying than them: Barbara. Ibbn't she beautibul? At least Ash gets a Bulbasaur.

11.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash and Pikachu face the third gym leader, Lt. Surge, and his REALLY FUNNY Raichu. Brock can't stop laughing. Misty wishes he would.

12.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash gets ready to face the fourth gym leader, Erika, by requesting help from Team Rocket. Misty is not amused. Brock is aroused.

13.SummaryEnglish: Uploaded on Jan 28, 2012 In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash Ketchum finds a gym that isn't really a gym, but battles anyways. Brock calls Misty "crazy". And so it begins.

14.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash Ketchum's hat departs from Ash's head, granting it increased intelligence. Brock and Misty recall the "good ol' days".

15.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, we offset last episode's flashbacks by jumping to the future! What happens to Ash, Misty, and Brock in the 'Bridged version of Pokemon Advanced?

16.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash, Misty, and Brock are trapped by the Narrator in Pokemon Harlem. Nurse Joy and Officer Jenny continue to not do their jobs properly.

17.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash Ketchum becomes a PI and solves the case of the missing Arnold's Mom's Charmander. Misty and Brock make mediocre sidekicks.

18.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, it's time again for Ash Ketchum to unfairly obtain another badge! Ninja Gym Leader Koga and his Ninja Daughter Aya Ninja battle him. Crazy Misty is strangely absent.

19.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash, Misty, and Brock get involved with the internal affairs of the Eevee Brothers Family.

20.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash and Pikachu finally explore the option of splitting up. Brock sees it all.

1.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, the trio learns a valuable lesson from Texas about profiting off of living things with no regard for their well-being. Shmoke shnakeroot erry day.

2.SummaryEnglish: n this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, we explore the medicinal capabilities of the Pokemon World. Or lack thereof.

3.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, the heroes explore the Safari Zone and fail to obtain any Pokemon or HM03.

4.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, the word "property" becomes extremely subjective. So does the word "food".

5.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, the gang experiences and abridgment of the bridge, bridging the gap between the last episode and the next.

6.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash, Misty, and Brock get really high... in altitude.

7.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash, Misty, and Brock meet a certain famous photographer Todd Snap. Misty is not amused.

8.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash finally becomes an equal to Brock and Misty. Also Team Rocket is there.

9.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Pokemon: The 'Bridged Series, Ash finally becomes an equal to Brock and Misty. Also Team Rocket is there.
